Appendix J¶

Appendix J: Seasonal efficiency for solid fuel boilers from test data¶

This appendix specifies how to obtain a seasonal efficiency from test data on a solid fuel boiler that is provided in the Product Characteristics Database. A database record for a solid fuel boiler includes:

  • SAP seasonal efficiency, %
  • Fuel input, heat to water and heat to room from test at full load, kW
  • Fuel input, heat to water and heat to room from test at part load, kW

All efficiency values are gross (net-to-gross conversion factors are given in Table E4).

sap.appendix.appendix_j.solid_fuel_boiler_from_pcdf(pcdf_data, fuel, use_immersion_in_summer)[source]¶

Implements Appendix J

Parameters:

  • fuel –
  • use_immersion_in_summer –
